resources.string: My Application
MainActivity
Hello Square World!
Say the name of the task...
Say the name of the event...
Say the date of the event (dd/mm)...
Say the time of the event (hh/mm)
Say the name of the shopping list...
CreateEvent
Sorry I can here you
I don\'t understand your order
Here are the results
Here are the different actions you can perform
Sound enabled
Sound disabled
Deletion cancelled
%1$s %2$s will be deleted are you sure?
%1$s %2$s has been deleted
The %1$s will be deleted, are you sure?
All %1$s have been deleted
%1$s not found
%1$s already exists
%1$s created successfully
%1$s name defined
Welcome to the To-Do list, where you can create, modify, query, or delete tasks
Task %1$s has been marked as done
Task %1$s has been marked as undone
All tasks have been marked as done
All tasks have been marked as undone

" Help me
 Unmark all tasks
 Mark all tasks

 Delete task X
 Delete all tasks

 Modify event X
 Enable sound
 Disable sound
 Go to events
 Go to shopping list
 Show undone tasks

 Show all tasks"
Welcome to the creation or modification of a task, configure the name of your task
" Help me\n Task name is X\n Create Task"
Welcome to Events, where you can create, modify, query, or delete events

" Help me
 Delete event X
